DOC.brief_title: Tanezumab Nerve Function In Arthritis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate 16 Nov 2010 follow US FDA clinical hold tanezumab osteoarthritis clinical study halt dose enrollment patient 23 June 2010 potential safety issue .
